xmlRoot.summary: 6 years of software development experience in J2EE, Portal and CMS system.
xmlRoot.skills: High-End Application Software: IBM Websphere Portal, Liferay Portal, Alfresco CMS system
Frameworks: Spring, Seam, JEE5, JEE6, Hibernate, iBatis, JPA, Freemarker, XML, JSON
Tools: eclipse, RAD, TOAD, MAVEN, Ant, UML, ER-Diagram, jBPM

projects.name: SBS (aka. Shared Business Services)
projects.details: Direct & Shared Business Services is a master layer in conjunction with J2EE web services to access data from FACTS/NASCO/FEP
